comment.author: 33018094@N03
comment._content:
from the Glenn L. Martin Company, Baltimore Maryland. What I want to know is who ripped off whose design?? Or was it a matter of Consolidated building a version under license because of wartime (WWII) demands on Martin (Martin B-26 for one!)
This looks like an earlier version of the entirely successful Consolidated PBY (5A?)

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/33018094@N03] Martin undercut Consolidated for the production contract: www.historyofwar.org/articles/weapons_martin_P3M.html
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
